display.title: Multiblock Structures
display.description: The are multiple crafting stuctures for you to explore, but starting off you'll need to craft a Stone Saw & Hammer. To create one all you have to do is drop a Stick and Stone Block onto a Fletching Table. A Stone Saw & Hammer are used to create specific Structure Kits that when dropped will place a Multiblock Structure [Required: 1x Stone 1x Stick | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
